title: Market Day
description: It's Market Day every Tuesday at the SU - stock up on fruit and veg at our indoor market and grab a tasty hot lunch from one of our international food stalls on the Union Plaza.

title: Double Down Late & Great
description: Every Tuesday from 5pm, you can double down on a range of items including pints, spirits, and our mouth-watering burgers. For a Freshers' Festival special, we'll be open until 1am!

title: Freshers' Ball ft. Jax Jones & Special Guest
description: Dress up to the nines and round off Freshers' Festival in style as we throw a massive ball at the Students' Union where Jax Jones will be headlining the biggest party of the week!

title: Petting Zoo
description: Back once again to add some cute and furry fun to your week! Go on pet the goat... we know you want to!

title: Saturday 7s
description: Staying local this Saturday? No food in the house? Don't worry, we've gotcha covered! Indulge in our £7 meal deals and £7 cocktails from 7pm.

title: Returners' Bevs
description: Early birds, this one's for you! Start your Freshers' Festival in style over at The Packhorse with drinks deals all night long!

title: Postgraduate Wine & Dine
description: Open to all postgraduate students (taught and research). Come along for a chilled evening of wine, nibbles and meeting new people!

title: Glitterbomb Drag Bingo & Karaoke
description: Dust off your favourite karaoke bangers, polish up those moves and get ready to slay the night away with amazing bingo prizes and some glitter-filled drag comedy!

title: Wine Glass Decorating
description: Fancy a girls evening out or did you recently break the one glass you bought from IKEA in September? Either way this is the perfect evening activity for you!

title: International Community Movie Night
description: Calling all International students! Come along for a chilled evening: watch a movie, chat with your International Community Officer and meet fellow international students.
